text: Mary Pierce was the defending champion, but did not compete this year. Eighth- seeded Klára Koukalová won the title by defeating Lucie Šafářová 3–6, 6–2, 6–2 in the final. ==Seeds== The top two seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== * Main draw Category:Rosmalen Grass Court Championships Category:2005 WTA Tour
title: 2005 Ordina Open – Women's Singles
